attributes.action: Student nurse need to be paid on placement
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to be paid. It is not fair that apprentice nurses, which I believe they are in the same position as student nurses, are getting paid. While student nurses are not getting nothing. 
We cant continue to work that hard and not get nothing in return. At least pay us something!
attributes.background: The Government need to pay us or calculate placement hours x hourly pay  and deduct it from the tuition fee!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554624
